str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.
Barabbas. Of Chaldee origin; son of Abba; Bar-abbas, an Israelite.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To flagellate, scourge. From a presumed equivalent of the Latin flagellum; to whip, i.e. Lash as a public punishment.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.
